definition: married couple very much in love/deep conjugal love

sentences.english: Two pairs of lovers coupled in wedlock in our company last week.
sentences.chinese: 上週我們公司兩對情人結爲伉儷。

sentences.english: Premier and Mrs. Yu had fun watching the monkeys on a trip to Leofoo Village Safari Park.
sentences.chinese: 賢伉儷於六福村野生動物園與人猿同樂。

sentences.english: Do your children see you and your spouse being  affectionate with one another?
sentences.chinese: 你的孩子看到了你們伉儷彼此鶼鰈情深的樣子嗎？

sentences.english: Now he and his wife would be called the 10)Duke and 11)Duchess of Windsor.
sentences.chinese: 現在他和妻子被稱爲溫莎公爵伉儷。

sentences.english: We all respect the wish of Prof and Mrs Kao for a return to a quiet and undisturbed life.
sentences.chinese: 我們尊重高錕教授伉儷回覆平靜生活的意願。

sentences.english: Now he and his wife would be called the Duke and Duchess of Windsor.
sentences.chinese: 現在他和妻子被稱爲溫莎公爵伉儷。

sentences.english: The royal couple appeared in splendid array.
sentences.chinese: 王室伉儷身穿豔服出現。

sentences.english: A year after we met, we married.
sentences.chinese: 認識一年之後，我們喜結伉儷。

definition: surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)
Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
